overview:
Mailspect offers a single platform that integrates:

 -  End-to-end security for email gateways and servers
 -  Email archive
 -  Data loss protection and 
 -  Email / attachment routing, blocking, filtering, logging, forwarding, i.e., comprehensive email stream management.

The Mailspect Control Panel puts the power to manage every aspect of the email stream – pre-scan, scan and post-scan – in the hands of the systems administrator. End-user access to the solution is via browser or email alert. Mailspect is particularly popular with Internet Service Providers, government service centers and educational institutions because of its flexibility, sophisticated and integration with LDAP directories, relational databases and HTTP services.

Mailspect Defense protects email gateways and servers from spam, viruses, phishing, fraud and Internet attacks. It is a best-of-breed Control Panel used to configure, monitor and update a multi-layered suite of defenses. Mailspect Defense protects your organization from the ever evolving threats on the Internet at the pre-scan, scan and post-scan phases of email processing. Using a high-speed, scalable email filter called mppd and a state-of-the-art quarantine solution called Message Viewer, Mailspect Defense offers email security for businesses, governments, schools and Internet service providers.

Mailspect Defense puts control of dozens of email security techniques, technologies and analytics in the hands of the systems administrator.

At the core of the system is a POLICY ENGINE that lets systems administrators set up policies based on email address, content, LDAP directory groups by address or domain and email direction â€“incoming or outgoing emails.

Archive - Mailspect Archive saves email in web accessible, searchable archives. Mailspect Archive archives real-time SMTP streams, Exchange journal reports, IMAP and imports over 20 different email formats. Archive offers a vast array of policy tools and email stream management tools that make it ideal for email service providers and ISP’s.

Email Stream Management – Extracts business value from the email stream using proprietary technology called Email Stream Manager.
